EmailTemplate.subject: Univar and Dow Corning have teamed up to handle all your silicone needs!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Univar Has Expanded Distribution Agreement with Dow Corning
<!-- -->
Univar, with one of the widest and deepest product portfolios, now adds Dow Corning's premier line of silicone additives to our nationwide line up.
Included are functional fluids, emollients, paint additives, substrate wetting agents, antifoams, defoamers, silanes and other silicone based chemistries.
If you have a silicone need, we have a solution.
Convenience Service Technical Assistance Local Inventory with Prompt Deliveries Economical and Competitive
To learn more please speak with your Univar Representative or contact your nearest Univar branch. Make sure to ask how you can make the switch to Dow Corning silicones.
ChemCare
Univar USA
Online Ordering
